title: As BOC, I can view cash considerations that are part of a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a trade transaction
custom_expected:
THEN each cash consideration in the trade should be displayed under the ORG that is paying the money, under a collapsible sub-section called 'Cash'
AND the columns in the cash table are:
- *To* - The Org that the payment is being made to
- *Amount* - Show commas and $
- *Competitive Balance Amount* - Show commas and $
- *Payable On/Before* - Format date as mm/dd/yyyy
- *Paid on* - If populated, show as mm/dd/yyyy

**Wireframe:**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=view_an_existing_trade
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=cash

title: As BOC, I can view intl signing bonus slots that are part of a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that an intl signing bonus slot was part of a trade
custom_steps: WHEN BOC views that trade
custom_expected:
THEN display under the Org that it originally belonged to, under sub-section 'International Signing Bonus Slot'
AND

- Show the slot details in view mode with the columns shown in the wireframe
- Data in ebis 1 should match ebis 2

title: As BOC, I can view Rule 4 draft picks that are part of a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a rule 4 draft pick was part of a trade,
custom_steps: WHEN BOC views that trade
custom_expected:
THEN display under the Org that it originally belonged to, under sub-section 'Rule 4 Draft Pick'
AND

- Show the draft pick details in view mode with the columns shown in the wireframe
- The Player column is blank until the respective draft has passed at which point, display the player who was drafted with that Round/Pick
- Player name should link to player history
- Data in ebis 1 should match ebis 2

title: As a club, I want to start a Trade with a player from another Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN a club user navigates to a player's profile who is in a different org, and then creates a new trade from the 'create' icon on the player header or player history widget
custom_expected:
THEN club should be allowed to proceed with the Trade (this is already happening)
AND the trade screen should pre-load that player with the Org he belongs to (this is already happening currently)
AND additionally, the trade screen should also auto-add the initiating club to the page. 
AND the initiating club cannot remove themselves from the trade screen.
AND club can continue to build out the rest of the trade as usual and Submit it to Club

title: As a club, I want to select an Authorized signatory for each Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
THEN 

- For each Org on the screen, add an "Authorized Signatory' field. 
- The dropdown for each Org shows that Org's Authorized signatories
- If it's a Minor league Trade, only show Signatories with 'MN Trans' in the signatory widget. 
- If it's a Major league trade, only show Signatories with 'MJ Trans' checked in the signatory widget
- This field is not required.
- The "Create New" option only appears next to the Authorized Signatory field of the logged in club. Club can use this to add a new signatory from the form.

title: As a club, I can add cash considerations to the trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
THEN 

- Club can use the "Add Considerations" menu to add a Cash Section to any Org
- A maximum of one cash consideration can be added per org so this option is no longer available in the menu once added
- The 'To' dropdown lists Orgs participating in the trade except the Org that the cash section is under. Field is required
- Amount column only accepts numbers. Auto-add commas. Field is required
- Competitive Balance Amount column is locked for editing and has the same value as Amount
- Payable on/Before is a date picker. Limit date range value from 1 month past until 2 years into the future. Field is required
- 'Paid on' field is not editable to clubs.
- Cash section can be removed with the delete icon

title: As a club, I want to attach forms for each player
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
**Wireframe:**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=add_attachments_to_considerations

THEN 

- Show an upload button against each player when the form is in edit mode as shown in wire.
- A club can only view the upload icon for players currently in thier Org
- Clicking on upload icon, opens an attached files popout
- Available labels are 'Notice of Disposition', 'Insurance Form' and 'Miscellaneous'
- Hitting 'continue' on the pop out closes the modal. However user must save the main form to fully save the attachments
- Hitting cancel undoes any changes to attached files
- Hitting anywhere outside closes the pop out
- User can use drag and drop and delete attachments from the pop out.

title: As a club, I can add additional players to the Trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I open an existing trade
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to add a player by using 'add consideration' button
AND I am unable to readd the same player more than once
AND the player list shows all MN and MJ league players (unless its a MN trade - then it shows only MN players)

title: As a club, I want to know if a player requires written consent for being a recently signed free agent
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN club creates a trade dated June 15th or earlier of the current year
AND club adds a player
AND the player being traded had a XXB FA transaction in the most recent FA filing period
custom_expected:
THEN the written consent checkbox appears
AND

- The written consent column only appears if at least one or more players in the table have the checkbox
- The checkbox is an editable field
- The field is required and has a red asterisk in the column header

title: As a club, I can enter a Rule 4 draft pick consideration when I have picks to trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
**AND that club has Competitve Balance Lottery picks entered into the Ebis 2.0 Rule 4 pre-draft screen**
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
THEN

- Club can use the "Add Considerations" menu to add a 'Rule 4 Draft Pick' Section to any Org. it can only be added once per Org
- The 'To' dropdown lists Orgs participating in the trade except the Org that the section is under. Field is required
- 'Year' is the next upcoming draft year and not editable
- **Lottery column is locked to 'Competitive Balance and not editable**
- **Round / Pick column lists the Round Name and Pick number (eg. CBA - 2) that the club has available to it in the upcoming draft. This comes from the Pre-Draft screen where they are entered. IF THE CLUB HAS NO PICKS TO TRADE, THE DROP-DOWN HAS NO OPTIONS. This is a required field.**
- Player column is hidden until after the draft is over
- Section can be removed with the delete icon
- Additional rows can be added. Club cannot re-enter the same pick to trade in multiple rows
- If all rows are deleted, remove the section automatically

title: As a club, I want to reject a named player
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Club can hit the 'Reject' button on the PTBNL. This updates the transaction status to "Rejected"
- Page reloads for rejecting club with no buttons
- Action item is cleared from approving club's clipboard.
- The initiating Club gets a notification with Description = Player to be Named Later  is rejected by [Org]
- The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees the option to delete the named player and add a different player and re-submit

title: As a Club, I want player's Pending Org and roster status to get updated on submitting him as a named player
custom_steps:
**AC**
When the PTBNL reaches Submitted to BOC, all AC in #129462741 and #129462861 should be met for the nominated player

title: As Boc, I want to approve a named player post-trade
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Once a PTBNL has been submitted to BOC, it appears on BOC clipboard for approval
- Clicking on the approval item opens the Trade in view mode
- BOC sees Approve and Reject buttons below the PTBNL
- Approving the PTBNL moves this transaction status to approved and the page reloads without the buttons.
- Run BOC on-submit rule checks before approval. See #129472911. In addition, also run the 2 global approval rule checks in #129463339 and #129463299
- Once the PTBNL is approved, update player's current Org and roster status. See #129463383
- All clubs can now view the named player but can no longer see the original Alt cash section. BOC continues to see this section.
- If player was on option, he must be recalled. See #128349225
- Make an entry in the Daily Transaction bulletin if player is major league #126241797
- Player history entry is now black font
- Show blue success notification on approval

title: As a participating club, I can see a trade I need to approve on Action items clipboard
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**AC**
- Once the initiating club submits the Trade to other clubs, each of the participating clubs will simultaneously receive an action item.
- Clicking on the action item will open the Trade in view mode. Refer to button table for available buttons
- The Action item has type = Transaction and Description = "Outright Trade submitted to Club by [Org 3 letter abbreviation]. It also shows the player name and date/time. If multiple players involved, show "Multiple"

title: As BOC, I can see the trade on my clipboard when all clubs have approved the Trade
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**AC**
- When all participating clubs have submitted the Trade to BOC, the Trade updates to "Submitted to BOC" state. Until then, it stays as Submitted to Club.
- Once the Trade reaches Submitted to BOC, it appears on the BOC's Clipboard similar to other Transactions. 
- The From Org is the initiating club. If more than 3 clubs are involved, the "To Org" column can say "Multiple".
- BOC can click on the Trade from the clipboard to see it in view mode. Updated button set should show on the form based on the button state table
- While the trade is in Submitted to BOC state, clubs can continue to have basic edit access listed in story #129462267. Use the player's "pending org" to determine if the club can attach forms for that player

title: As BOC, I can reject a Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND viewing a submitted trade
custom_steps: WHEN BOC hits the Reject button on the Trade
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction to "Rejected"
AND reverses all Submit updates in story #129462741
AND page reloads for BOC with updated button set. See button state table
AND all participating clubs get a notification with Description = Outright (Trade) is rejected by BOC
AND initiating club receives a rejection notification. (The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees an updated button set with full edit access similar to preliminary. Other Orgs only see it in view mode with a Close button.)
AND initiating club can resubmit the rejected Trade to "Submit to Club" state or can delete the transaction
AND remove transaction from approvals clipboard and from Player history

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully rejected"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

title: As BOC, I want to approve a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC clicks the 'Approve' button on the Trade.
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction status to "Approved"
AND after approval, page reloads for BOC with updated button set. 
AND BOC can also perform this action by selecting the transaction on the clipboard and hitting Approve as a single or bulk operation
AND when the transaction is approved, all participating Orgs get a clipboard notification "Outright (Trade) is approved"
AND Trade now becomes viewable to all other clubs though they cannot see attachments and comments
AND Player history entry becomes black font and is visible to all clubs
AND Clipboard approval item is removed for BOC
AND player's service calculation and 10/5 calc is updated 

**Global**
- Show success notification - "The transaction has been successfully Approved"
- Approve button is blue
- Status and dates section must update

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I can reverse a trade
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**AC**
- BOC can hit the 'Reverse' button on an Approved Trade. This updates the transaction status to "Reversed"
- BOC may only reverse this trade if it is the most recent approved transaction for all involved players. If not, show hard error "Only a player's latest approved transaction can be reversed"
- Reverse all Approval updates in story #129463383 and reset all players to their Org/roster status prior to the transaction. 
- Page reloads for BOC with updated button set. See button state table
- All participating clubs get a notification with Description = Outright (Trade)  is reversed
- Player history and daily trans bulletin gets (Voided) next to description
- If an auto-recall was created, that gets reversed also.
- Rule 4 draft picks traded value and intl signing bonus slot adjustments must be reversed to their original value

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully reversed"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

title: As Club, I can submit a trade for other club's review
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing a preliminary trade
AND hits submit to Club button on trade
custom_expected:
THEN the trade status is updated to submitted
AND blue success notification is shown
AND updated by sections are updated with time/user information

title: As a club, I want to ensure that each participating Org gives and receives something in the trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user is viewing a preliminary trade
AND there is a club participating in the trade that does not have any considerations or is not listed as the "To Org" in any consideration
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the trade
custom_expected: THEN show hard error: "Each club must give and receive at least one consideration"

title: As BOC, I want to be stopped from approving a future Trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN approving a trade
custom_expected:
THEN in addition to running all the On-Submit rules, This rule is also run on approval and is a hard error for BOC: Bus rule 2.52 - The Transaction Date must not be after the current date. 
AND if rule fails, show error: "This transaction cannot be approved unless the Transaction date is on or before the current date"

title: As a Club/BOC, I want to see Player History updated with the Trade information
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a Trade reaches Submitted to BOC state
custom_expected:
THEN Player history now has an entry in green font for each player involved in the Trade.
AND the description for the entry is "Outright (Trade)" and it only has the Org/club he originated from and got traded to (even if other clubs were also involved in the trade)
AND the description clicks into the Trade form
AND while the trade is pending, it's only visible to all participating Orgs + BOC

title: As BOC, I want an approved Trade to appear on the Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND a trade involves any MJ players
custom_steps: WHEN the trade is approved
custom_expected:
THEN update the Daily transaction bulletin. Refer linked Jama document for formatting
AND for each player movement, create entry under both the receiving and originating Org
AND minor lg players are also listed in the bulletin if they were part of the MJ trade
AND draft picks and Intl SB slot trades are also listed in the bulletin under both receiving org and originating org

**Reference**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2309499?projectId=14044

title: As a club/BOC, I can name a player to be named later for an Outright to Mexican League
custom_steps:
**AC**
- This functionality should work the same as naming a player for an Outright Trade
- The dropdown to pick the player should be limited to Minor league players only
- AC in the following stories should apply (except MJ only logic) #129472041, #129954263, #129472093, #129472863
- There is no club approval process. Submitted named players go straight to BOC for approval.
- Player's pending Org/Club gets updated on Submit and current org/club gets updated on approval
- Repeat the following on Submit rule checks on applicable state changes
2.03 - #126261273
2.18 - #126526871
2.17 - #126431981
2.19.1 - #134040745
2.19 - #126534133
2.52 - #129463339 - approval only
2.51 #129463299 - approval only

title: As club/BOC, I can add PTBNL considerations to an OTML transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing an OTML
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add Consideration under the MLB org
custom_expected:
THEN they can add a Player to be Named Later consideration
AND this option is not available for the Mex orrg
AND this consideration behaves the same as on trades, except it does not have a pay schedule button
AND the "To" club is limited to Mex clubs that are already receiving a regular player in this outright.

title: As BOC, I can approve an Outright to Mx Lg Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND user is viewing a Submitted to BOC OTML
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Run the applicable OnSubmit rule checks but with overrides for BOC
AND the state change buttons appears as listed in https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2281404?projectId=14044
AND Transaction is no longer editable for BOC with the exception of fields mentioned in #129708081
AND Status and Dates section is updated.
AND Blue notification is generated
AND Reload page after state change
AND Player's Pending Org (MEX) and Pending Club should become his current Org and club

title: As BOC, I can reverse, reject or suppress an Outright to MX lg transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is an OTML that is Submitted to BOC
AND an approved OTML
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC clicks reject on the Submitted OTML
AND clicks reverse on the Approved OTML
AND then clicks suppress on the Reversed OTML
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can reject the submitted OTML. This will reverse any updates made to the trade/players when it was submitted to BOC
AND Club gets a rejection notification and can update and resubmit the transaction to BOC
AND BOC can reverse the approved OTML. This will reverse all approval updates and change the transaction status to Reversed
AND BOC can suppress the reversed transaction,  this will hide it for the club in all widgets and searches (player history, advanced search, notifications)

title: As a club, I want to print a Life insurance form for each player in the Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a trade
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print next to a player
custom_expected: THEN the user can print a Life Insurance form

title: As a Club, I want to print an Assignment Agreement for the trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a trade
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print at the bottom of the trade form
custom_expected:
THEN the Assignment Agreement can be printed
AND If more than 2 clubs are involved, list all clubs on the same AA. For example, if there were 3 clubs involved, the opening para would say ...between the Oakland Athletics, Chicago Whitesox and New York Mets."
AND each club involved has their own signature section with a maximum of 2 signature blocks side-by-side
AND the signature section has the name of the authorized signatory populated on the appropriate line

title: As a club, I can print an Assignment Agreement for Outright to mexican league
custom_steps:
**AC**
- The Assignment agreement is the exact same as a trade, with the "To org" always being Mexican League and the to club is the selected Mexican Club.
- In the Signature block for the Mexican League, instead of printing "Mexican League" for Club, print the Club name instead

title: As a Club, I want to print the Trades Checklist  with mandatory checklist items
custom_steps:
**Buttons**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**Sample Trade Checklist**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2350800?projectId=14044

**Trade Checklist Item-by-item Requirements**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2311448?projectId=14044

**AC**
- Add the "Print" button to the Trade. See button document for states, position, color etc
- The Print button has a sub menu for 'Checklist' and 'Assignment Agreement'
- If user chooses Checklist, then open a PDF of the Trade Checklist in a new tab
- Only appears on Major League trades

The Trade checklist has some checklist items that are displayed always, while other checklist items are conditional. For this story, generate a PDF with the mandatory checklist items. Refer to the item-by-item requirements for text to display and order
- Deferred Compensation section
- Medical Info section
- Negotiate Extension section
- Verify Entry section
- Life insurance section

title: As a Club, I want to print a Notice of Disposition for each player in the Trade in English
custom_steps:
**Report Layout and Samples**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2311540?projectId=14044

**Sourcing and Details**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2311543?projectId=14044

**AC**
- An NOD can be printed for each player involved in the Trade

custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND user is viewing a Submitted to BOC OTML

custom_expected:
THEN Run the applicable OnSubmit rule checks but with overrides for BOC
